item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I’m Ishan With a passion for Computer Hardware and Software, I have both the skill set and professional background necessary to dive deep into the technological world. I have cleared my High School and Intermediate from Central Academy, Lucknow, with an acceptable GPA of 8.6 in High School and 77% in Intermediate. Currently, I am pursuing my 3rd-year Btech from Vellore Institute of Technology, Amravati, Andra Pradesh with a CGPA of 8.
